/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architectural styles ranging from modern to traditional, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. Cars and buses are seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
